com.AppUtils.interfaces

Interface UIPreferences

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreferencesManager

    public interface UIPreferences

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Font[] fonts
      An interface that defines basic rules that apply when you create a subprogram that changes UI settings such as colors(background,foreground) or fonts
